Beginning in May UTA will offer online certification classes to students in Latin America as part of a partnership with the Ilumno Network.The Ilumno Network is a network of  Latin American universities with more than  students PERIOD

This is the Ilumno Networks first partnership with an American university said Raul Duany Illumno Institutional Affairs director PERIOD The Network offers classes in Argentina Brazil Chile Colombia Panama Paraguay Peru and Costa Rica PERIOD

With this partnership we are opening up serviceoriented career training for students said Duany PERIOD While the students will not be receiving traditional bachelors degrees the certifications offered can help them advance in a competitive workplace. five certificates will be available for students enrolled at Ilumno Network universities from UTA including a Certificate in Public Health PERIOD Each certificate will take  hours and are not transferrable said Duany PERIOD

This will be all online Duany said PERIOD Content provided by UTA will be translated into Spanish and Portuguese in Argentina and from there uploaded to the host websites PERIOD Students can then download material and upload submissions. this partnership is not UTAs first international venture said Cassandra Smith UTA Continuing Education assistant director PERIOD

UTA also offers an online certificate in Autism Studies which has a large number of students from Africa participating said Smith PERIOD Working with Ilumno Network we modified our courses for them based on what they think they will need PERIOD Were really optimistic that these courses will be met by a good turnout. in many cases the students who will be taking these certifications will be professionals who are already active in their field Smith said PERIOD Getting a certificate from an American university can help them move up in their careers PERIOD

I think this is great said architecture sophomore David Rodriguez PERIOD By giving people a chance to improve themselves through education especially in the developing world UTA can make an important difference in the quality of life for thousands. johnMCrowley
